content.value:
This year has been heartbreaking, depressing, paralyzing — in almost every way. 

But some things about it have also been liberating, and I have to figure out how to cling to those things in a vaccinated future — even when others expect me not to.
content.html: This year has been heartbreaking, depressing, paralyzing — in almost every way. But some things about it have also been liberating, and I have to figure out how to cling to those things in a vaccinated future — even when others expect me not to.
